title: Staying upfront
creator_credit: Stephen Ramsey, Michael Rubetzki and Film Australia
brief_description: This is a film about a long distance owner truck driver and his family. The reasons why he became an owner-driver are explored as well as the rewards he gets from it, and the effect on his family of operating in a high pressure, often marginal income industry.
creator_credit_for_label: Stephen Ramsey, Michael Rubetzki and Film Australia
